Text.Page:
That squirming pipelike structure to my right is a zalgeg coil left by the argons; the only operational item they left behind, as far as I know.

Perhaps you could secure a piece for us.

It's not alive...that's a relief, I suppose.

It might be this peculiar water that makes it writhe. Or the substance inside...like bright blue blood.
One piece of a goodly size will do, thanks.
